comment: She is so nice! Easy class- as long as you turn in all of your work you will pass.

I got a 89.3. I have a 3.7 gpa so its not such a big deal but imagine someone on scholarship or on academic probation that needed an A. It cost her nothing to give you that A but it could cost someone thousands of dollars or hours of time. I didn't take the class serious and only got two B's the entire time so its a great class just weighted weird.
She is so great at what she does. Her lectures aren't too bad and the test are easy if you just pay attention

Professor Heflin is great. This class taught me a lot about PR and I used the things I learned in other classes this semester. Given that it's an online class, she wasn't super involved, but she was always available if needed. Her class was well organized and assignments were easy to understand. If you do the work and read, it's an easy A.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: Assignments are due every Monday, and she has a very clear grading criteria. Tests aren't on lockdown, and the notes she provides are very useful for every other PR class you take. Highly recommend!

Professor Heflin is super nice! She isn't a tough grader and is very knowledgeable but funny at the same time. Her lectures can get kind of boring but they're full of valuable information for public relations students. Her tests are pretty difficult and are around 50 questions, but they're straight from the lectures!

Prof. Heflin is the AWESOME! I took her course in the summer and it was the first summer course I've ever taken. Heflin is very understanding, sweet and helpful. She facilitates quality class discussion and is always readily available for any questions or concerns. If you have the opportunity to take courses with Dr. Heflin, you will not regret it,

Prof. Helflin is great! Took this as a hybrid but the rare online assignments are super easy! Final project is a great grade booster id you need it. She's funny and high energy which makes her lectures interesting. Occasional guest speaker and very straightforward tests. Will need the book if you want an A test grade

Awesome professor! She's very clear and straightforward. No test/quizzes. Do NOT buy the book! Work in about 2-3 different groups. Fun class. She gives very clear grading instructions. Again, mostly everything is within a group except the time sheet pretty much.  Very kind and caring. DEFINITELY recommend her! Never be afraid to ask questions.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: I was really scared about taking the capstone because I thought it'd be super difficult, but Heflin is amazing. I've taken harder lower level classes. TONS of constant work and deadlines, but it's not too rough. You're in multiple groups throughout the whole semester. No reading/textbook. Mandatory attendance. TAKE HEFLIN FOR YOUR CAPSTONE.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: She knows a lot about what she's teaching and she has good real world experience to relate it.  Four blog posts, one test, and one group project that are all 1/3 of your grade.  She will curve the test which is nice.  Without putting in a ton of effort it's an easy B.  Study well for the test and you'll likely get an A in the class.

Dr. Heflin was the best professor I have encountered here at KSU. She was always helpful, and made the difficulties of  PR capstone seem achievable. I also took her for PR Study Tour, which was great as well!  Words cannot describe how much I enjoyed Dr. Heflin's classes, she knows her information and only wants the best for her students.

Professor Heflin, is awesome!!!!  I took her for COM 3375 - Public Relations Writing.  She was quite enthusiastic, helpful and thoroughly enjoys teaching.  Professor Heflin takes great pride in her work and seeing her students not only succeed in the classroom but in their future endeavors.  She extends her help and expertise over and beyond.   #1

Dr. Heflin is AWESOME! Words can't even describe how great this professor is. She cares so much about her students and she has a TON of PR experience. She will help and guide you through any assignment and is truly there to help you succeed. I took Dr. Heflin for Writing and Campaigns and LOVED her! Take this professor!

Prof. Heflin is a newer staff member at KSU but Ill be the first to say she is definitely a beneficial addition to the COM dept. She has worked in the PR field for quite some time therefore extremely knowledgeable. You can tell she cares about her students & takes prides in preparing them to enter the 'real world.' Want to be prepared? Take her.
